name: surface_radioactivity_content_of_77As
description: The surface called "surface" means the lower boundary of the atmosphere. "Content" indicates a quantity per unit area. "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "As" means the element "arsenic" and "77As" is the isotope "arsenic-77" with a half-life of 1.62e+00 days.
